tasks.name: Daily Startup Funding Facts
tasks.description: Track factual funding data and metrics

largest_round_today.description: Company name, exact funding amount in millions USD, lead investor, and company's primary business in format: 'CompanyName raised $XM led by InvestorName for [business description]'

total_funding_announced.description: Sum of all funding rounds announced today in millions USD, format: '$X.XM across Y deals'

top_funded_sectors.description: Top 3 industry sectors by total funding amount today, format: '1. SectorName ($XM), 2. SectorName ($XM), 3. SectorName ($XM)'

new_unicorn_count.description: Number of companies reaching $1B+ valuation today with company names, format: 'X new unicorns: CompanyName, CompanyName' or 'No new unicorns today'

series_a_count.description: Total number of Series A rounds announced today, format: 'X Series A rounds totaling $XM'

geographic_breakdown.description: Top 3 countries/regions by funding amount, format: 'US: $XM, China: $XM, Europe: $XM'

median_round_size.description: Median funding round size across all announced rounds, format: '$XM median round size'

tasks.input: Find all startup funding rounds announced today. Calculate total amounts, count deals by stage and sector, identify largest rounds, and provide geographic breakdown. Focus on verifiable funding amounts and company details from official announcements.

tasks.name: Daily Product Release Tracker
tasks.description: Track concrete product launches and feature releases

enterprise_software_launches.description: B2B software products launched today with company name, product name, and target use case, format: 'CompanyName launched ProductName for [use case]'

consumer_app_releases.description: Consumer mobile apps or web services launched today, format: 'AppName by CompanyName - [core functionality] - Available on [platforms]'

api_announcements.description: New APIs or developer tools announced today, format: 'CompanyName API - [functionality] - [pricing if available]'

beta_programs_started.description: Products entering public or private beta today, format: 'ProductName by CompanyName - [description] - [how to join]'

major_updates.description: Significant updates to existing popular products, format: 'ProductName version X.X - [key new features]'

hardware_announcements.description: Physical products or devices announced today, format: 'ProductName by CompanyName - [specs] - $[price] - [availability]'

tasks.input: Find concrete product launches, app releases, API announcements, and beta program starts from today. Focus on official company announcements with specific product details, pricing, and availability information.

tasks.name: Daily Regulatory Update Facts
tasks.description: Track specific regulatory announcements and deadlines

new_rules_announced.description: Specific regulations or rules announced today by government agencies, format: '[Agency] announced [rule name] affecting [industry] - effective [date]'

upcoming_deadlines.description: Compliance deadlines within next 30 days, format: '[Regulation] deadline [date] for [affected entities]'

enforcement_actions.description: Fines, penalties, or enforcement actions announced today, format: '[Company] fined $[amount] by [agency] for [violation]'

public_comment_periods.description: New public comment periods opened today, format: '[Agency] seeking comments on [topic] until [deadline]'

international_agreements.description: International trade or regulatory agreements signed or announced today, format: '[Countries] signed [agreement name] for [purpose]'

tasks.input: Find specific regulatory announcements from government agencies today including new rules, enforcement actions, compliance deadlines, and public comment periods. Focus on official government sources and specific dates, amounts, and affected parties.

tasks.name: Daily Earnings Results Monitor
tasks.description: Track public company earnings releases and key financial metrics

earnings_beats.description: Companies that beat EPS estimates today, format: 'CompanyName: actual $X.XX vs estimate $X.XX (+X%)'

earnings_misses.description: Companies that missed EPS estimates today, format: 'CompanyName: actual $X.XX vs estimate $X.XX (-X%)'

revenue_surprises.description: Largest revenue beats or misses vs estimates, format: 'CompanyName revenue: $XM actual vs $XM estimate'

guidance_changes.description: Companies raising or lowering future guidance, format: 'CompanyName raised/lowered guidance to $X.XX from $X.XX'

stock_reactions.description: Largest post-earnings stock moves today, format: 'CompanyName +/-X.X% after earnings'

tasks.input: Find all public company earnings releases today. Compare actual results to analyst estimates for EPS and revenue. Track guidance changes and immediate stock price reactions.

tasks.name: Daily Patent and IP Activity
tasks.description: Monitor patent filings and intellectual property developments

notable_patent_filings.description: Significant patent applications published today from major companies, format: 'CompanyName filed patent for [technology] - Application #XXXXXXX'

patent_grants.description: Important patents granted today, format: 'Patent #XXXXXXX granted to CompanyName for [technology description]'

ip_litigation.description: New patent infringement lawsuits or IP disputes filed today, format: 'CompanyA sued CompanyB over Patent #XXXXXXX for [technology]'

trademark_applications.description: Notable trademark applications filed today, format: 'CompanyName applied for trademark on [name/logo] for [product category]'

tasks.input: Search patent databases and IP news for patent applications published today, patents granted, new IP litigation, and trademark filings from major companies.

tasks.name: Daily Executive Leadership Changes
tasks.description: Track C-level appointments, departures, and board changes

ceo_appointments.description: New CEO appointments announced today, format: 'CompanyName appointed PersonName as CEO, replacing PreviousCEO, effective [date]'

cto_cfo_changes.description: CTO, CFO, and other C-level appointments, format: 'CompanyName hired PersonName as [title] from [previous company]'

board_appointments.description: New board of directors appointments, format: 'PersonName joined CompanyName board, bringing [expertise area]'

executive_departures.description: Executive departures or resignations announced today, format: 'PersonName left role as [title] at CompanyName after X years'

tasks.input: Find executive leadership changes announced today including CEO appointments, C-level hires, board appointments, and departures from public and private companies.

tasks.name: Daily Cybersecurity Incident Monitor
tasks.description: Track disclosed security breaches and cybersecurity developments

data_breaches_disclosed.description: Data breaches disclosed today, format: 'CompanyName disclosed breach affecting X users/records, discovered [date]'

ransomware_attacks.description: Ransomware incidents reported today, format: 'CompanyName hit by [ransomware group], operations [status]'

security_vulnerabilities.description: Critical security vulnerabilities announced today, format: 'CVE-XXXX-XXXX in [software] allows [attack type], patch [availability]'

incident_response_updates.description: Updates on previously reported incidents, format: 'CompanyName: [incident status update] - X% operations restored'

tasks.input: Monitor cybersecurity incident disclosures, ransomware attacks, critical vulnerabilities, and incident response updates from today. Focus on officially disclosed information with specific impact details.
